lego for the blind
  • about
  • instructions
  • press

    • Braille instructions for Lego sets are few and far between.

    We've created a system that allows blind and visually impaired people to build lego sets independly.

    How it works

    Download one of the text-based instructions.
    Have a sighted friend help sort the pieces.
    Build the set on par with a sighted builder.
    Tell your friends about Lego for the Blind

    Lego for the Blind is created by Matthew Shifrin.
    Website by Kevin Ma.
